response.overview: Some movies just reach deep into your soul, and Wicked is one of them. From the very first minutes, its magic completely enveloped me and took me on a never ending emotional journey.  Jon M. Chu has proven himself a true master of his direction, capturing the essence of this story with the sensitivity and talent that only a great genius possesses. Thanks to the work of Jon and the entire production team that worked on this film, every shot, every detail, every song, every scene is a testament to Jon's deep understanding of this beloved work.
response.title: Romance, Fantasy, Musical
